CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in the Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 30, 1962, pg. 6 reads: Little Rhonda Gail Lloyd is a real glamour girl in the home of her parents, Mr. and Mrs. Ronald Lloyd of 7604 Hamilton Ave.  Here she shows off some of her charm for Courier photographer Charles (Teenie) Harris..."Boy! Now I Really feel like kicking up my heels!" "
TitMainTitle: Two frames: Portrait of child wearing light colored overalls and short braids, with right hand on ear, seated on floral and diamond patterned chair in home of Mr. and Mrs. Ronald Lloyd on 7604 Hamilton Avenue; Child wearing light colored overalls and short braids, seated with Rhonda Gail Lloyd, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Ronald Lloyd, on floral and diamond patterned chair in home on 7604 Hamilton Avenue
